name: YAES/S
description:
Would you like a Sandbox game about evolution?

I hope your answer is "Heck YAES/S!" (see what I did there?)

Guide and observe and the development of little square creatures across time. Control the environment that they evolve in, and watch them learn, all through random chance!

All relevant instructions and information are present in-game. What sort of weird and wacky behaviours will you find?

Have fun!

If you enjoyed the game, consider supporting me on Patreon.

Credits:

Video that Inspired me to do this
